sentence.Network_en: The sheep were driven to the local abattoir.
sentence.Network_cn: 羊被赶到当地的屠宰场.

sentence.Network_en: A Judas goat led sheep into the abattoir.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只带路的山羊把绵羊引到屠宰场去了.

sentence.Network_en: You went out with that girl from the abattoir.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不是跟屠宰场的那个女的约会过吗?

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from abattre 'to fell'

entry.def: An abattoir is a place where animals are killed in order to provide meat.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where animals are butchered

auth_sentence.content: Our house smells suddenly like an abattoir.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our house smells suddenly like an abattoir.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our house smells suddenly like an abattoir.

auth_sentence.content: This awful city, it screams like an abattoir full of retarded children.
auth_sentence.res_content: This awful city, it screams like an abattoir full of retarded children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This awful city, it screams like an abattoir full of retarded children.

auth_sentence.content: Quite a couple of years ago a friend of mine got a breakdown from the abattoir where he sent a herd of goats to slaughter.
